Same with the reverse grip for lower back. I'm sure that if you drag it straight up or to the side without following the instructions, you will probably cut yourself. I shave dry and it's been fine. RTFM.

You don't have to use a lot of pressure and I would advise not to do so because doing it too hard can cut but once you find your "method" I doubt that would be an issue.

Up to this point I had to constantly chase down my wife to shave my back. So glad that I bought it. If you go in a straight direction, make sure the blade is flat on your skin, and go slow...you will not cut yourself. It’s really easy. My wife loves my smooth back and the fact that she doesn’t have to do the work anymore herself!

Tried it the first time dry...was sure I would be seeing blood....but all I saw was a smooth back. It glides over your back...no nicks / no cuts. Honestly as smooth as waxing without all the pain. Guys if you have a hairy back and no one to help groom you buy this product. It will be your best purchase.

Yes it will take you a few times till you figure out the best way to shave your back. You might have to bend forward to make your back flat by your shoulder blades to make it easier to get the hair. customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: No worry about slicing skin off; took 5 tries for a few crazy hairs on my back.
customer_reviews.text: The devise is quite large so there is no hiding what this thing is for. It would easily blend in with the kitchen spatulas and accessories or in the back of the truck with the ice scrapers; probably a better hiding place than the bathroom closet where it may be mistaken for a mirror squeegee or callous remover. It definitely works after several passes though you need to contortion yourself to see. If you are over 50, I recommend some stretching exercises prior to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maxatawny Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sasquatch descendants!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since the DNA tests confirmed that my husband was dropped off on his parents’ doorstep by a nice Sasquatch couple, many of our heredity questions were answered. What was not answered however was a solution to having to shave my Yeti’s back every week... a task I hated almost as much as I love him!!! The back blade is just what we needed! It has eliminated cramped shower space, shaving til the water tuned cold, finding icky little hairs all over the soap and unsolicited shower whoopie! Thanks back blade!!! I highly suggest this product if you too, are a product of Big Foot, Sasquatch, or the Yeti!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars Isn’t Enough
customer_reviews.text: Just used the Backblade 2.0 for the first time. Works Amazingly Well! Simple easy to use. Used it in the shower which in my opinion is probably the best way to use it, and can tell you that is works as advertised. Does a really good job of removing unwanted back hair and saves you the humiliation of having to ask your wife/girlfriend or significant other to shave it for you. If this is something you are considering...do not hesitate to pick one up! This is NOT a paid review. I have no affiliation with this company. I paid for mine just like anyone else. It’s just real truly good product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hope it would make shaving my back very easy. Pros: - Decent size to enable you to reach across your entire back - Blade is well made Cons: - Need to be careful around moles - I didnt find it made things easier for me to shave my back Do I recommend: If you have moles on your back I would recommend other means of shaving your back. I just wasnt really impressed and ended up not using this after a couple times
customer_reviews.author: curtis

customer_reviews.title: Fastest most efficient shave you'll ever experience preformed  by yourself
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product is it is efficient, accurate, fast non electrical no batteries but gets the job done effectively,results better than expected, I'm not a bear hairy guy also dont dig deep,just glid the item over your skin and let it do it's job,if you're on the fence about this item I would highly recommend trying it and yes I got about three Nix's because I was rushing, in the picture that's hair in my hand, there was more hair in the sink and on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Followed Directions, Used shave gel to be safe, multiple cuts, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I had been awaiting this product for a while. The idea is simple and design seemed sensible. There were many positive reviews. I wanted to improve grooming habits as I've lost 74 lbs and hit gym 6 days a week. I never wanted to ask girlfriend to help with manscaping. Well I tried this product in shower with gel. I have multiple cuts on shoulders, shoulder blade, and back. Blades are very sharp and the safety guides are a joke. I'm very disappointed. Cannot return the BaKblade, but will return extra blades purchased. I would not recommend this product at all. Bought on lightning deal... Should have spent money on something else.
customer_reviews.author: rlctnt1

customer_reviews.title: Makes back shaving much easier.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, and makes it easy to shave my back. I find it struggles in some areas, and the blades get clogged without being able to really clean them out due to the nature of how they're mounted (to protect your skin). Still, WAY easier than how I used to try to get the hair off my back. Worst area is around my shoulder blades where it struggles to get the hair off, and is most likely to take skin off, too. I can easily reach that area with a traditional facial razor, which works much better.
customer_reviews.author: B Dizzle Fizzle

customer_reviews.title: BAKblade 2.0 - Useful product...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product without much expectation to be honest, I want it something to shave my back hair myself without asking someone to help me. I purchased the regular BAKblade 2.0 withe the 2 blades, not the BAKblade 2.0 Elite which I think is enough to get the job done. I shaved my whole back in about 2 to 3 minutes, I only have to re-shave once a week to maintain it. Not sure what is the evolutionary purpose of men back hair is for, but this product is certainly very helpful for personal grooming. Yes, I would recommend this product to men with hairy back.
customer_reviews.author: Marvel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that lazy man with a hairy back.
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for the man that is embarrassed by his hairy back, and refuses to get laser hair removal. I bought this product for my husband as a Christmas Gag gift. Because it never fails; I would be in a hurry and he would always ask me to knock down the hair on his back. He would want to shave his back before going to a pool party, or to a sports club locker room. He began using the Bckblade, and he loves it. Very easy to use. It’s easy to change out the blades. So my gag gift turned out to be the best gift!
customer_reviews.author: Quapaw Woman

customer_reviews.title: breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea behind this product. It's probably as easy as it gets to use in an area that's difficult to reach. It's fairly easy to use, you just need to get the exact angle for best results. I personally can't use it dry without getting a rash but with shaving cream or liquid shower soap it's fine. As far as ergonomics, the problem is it slipped out of my hand and dropped to the tile floor of the shower and shattered so now the blades won't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A

customer_reviews.title: Murdered my skin
customer_reviews.text: Ive never had such a bad case of razor burn in my entire life. Im about to call a doctor just to make sure its not something else. Definitely caused by this product either way. Sensitive skin? Even a little? Stay away...
customer_reviews.author: Keith Darlin

customer_reviews.title: Not as efficient as I thought it was..
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this to be honest. The reviews and the videos made it look like it’s something great, but it lacks in a lot of areas. Firstly, it isn’t long enough to get all your back. It also cuts and scrapes your skin as you shave. And the most disappointing aspect of this product are the blades. They are literally useless and dull after one shave. JUST ONE! It becomes completely dull. I’m not going to spend 10-15 dollars every couple weeks on the blades. I wouldn’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cinar_20

customer_reviews.title: Fastest way to smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the bakblade 1.0 for several years with great success. When I went to order blade refuls I say the Bakblade 2.0 and decided to give it a try. Skeptical that it could be much better, I was pleasantly surprised to see how much more effective it was. I am a hairy guy, but the Bakblade 2.0 allowed me to get back to smooth skin in just a couple of minutes. My wife appreciates a wrll groomed husband, and this made it easy. My only caution is to got slow for the first few swipes as it is sharp and I got a couple small knicks as I went a little too fast, but nothing serious.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Starkenburg

customer_reviews.title: Good but blades don't last long at all
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I was initially impressed by this product. I have a hairy back (God is a cruel mf) but I'm by no means a gorilla-which is pictured on the handle of this razor. The blades just don't last. I got two good uses out of it dry shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Varnes

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about the Bakblade because I was used to using electric devices to remove back hair. But after reading all the positive reviews, I gave it a shot. Perfect! On my skin, the blades work perfectly. I would recommend already having your back relatively shaved first, and then using the Bakblade 2 or 3 times a week after that. Great! Update 15 months later: At about the 8-month mark the blade holder broke and I used a twist tie to hold it together. Now the major hinge broke, and it's just about unusable. we The thing works great, but it's just not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. GrvThang

customer_reviews.title: Watch out.  Incoming.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review ever on Amazon and I’ve been a Prime member for approximately 5 years. After I use this thing I’m cut up like I’ve just spent 12 rounds standing in front of Ali. I’ve tried everything. Soft and hard. Still leaves me looking like I’ve been in a war zone. The thing looks like a torture device and feels like one too. Maybe I’m doing something wrong. I don’t know. Best spending more money on a higher quality battery run device or settle for looking like an ape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, easy to take off back hair easily. Cut my shaving time in half and the hair stays off longer. This works well dry or wet. The only thing is not to shave too hard but nice and light does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have a muscular back, traps, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I owned the original BakBade 1.0. I really liked that product but the blades were garbage. I upgraded to this version. It’s really hard to use if you have a musclular back. After the first use, I was left bleeding in 3 areas. It may seem like user error, but this is an inferior design.
customer_reviews.author: Tampakingpin

customer_reviews.title: 5 star 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I order this yesterday morning and it came around 7 pm. Omg this is the backshaver ever. You can use this dry or in the shower. Not only it’s for the back, it for the whole entire body. Your arms, chest, lower calves and legs. I am very impressed of this product. I saw this product on YouTube about a year or two. This is very creative product. Make sure you don’t put the blade to deep in your skin. The blade is not very sharp. I promise you it will remove the hair off of your whole entire body. 100 percent worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but I live alone so I needed to do something other than wax or hair removal creams that require assistance for the hard to reach places (and I refuse to go pay for this sort of public/spa service). Works wet or dry, easy to clean, reaches everything with ease, its sharp but doesn't cut the skin, doesn't snag, and it folds up for easy drawer storage. The suction cup holder for the shower was an added perk. PS - buy the extra blades. I haven't had to change one yet, but you never know when a product like this gets discontinued...the extra blades will make this thing last for a decade.
customer_reviews.author: prodiver22

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for hairy dudes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm hairy like a gorilla. I was extremely sceptical of this product, having tried similar things in the past. Long story short, this thing is amazing! I'm a fan for life! I tend to get about 5 shaves out of a set of blades. It helps if you're disciplined about cleaning the blades after each shave. It did take me a couple of tries to get a good "system" and learn how the shaver acts on my back. But after about 2 shaves, I'm a pro!
customer_reviews.author: technopoetic

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: My man does not like it, to hard to use and doesn't work well in the areas that he has reached. It has also cut him up
customer_reviews.author: Cressa Gamache

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, almost no learning curve, and very well-made!
customer_reviews.text: Got it out of the package and loaded up the blades, which is about as easy as putting Legos together. I immediately gave it a try on the shoulders and my lats without any lubricant. It works great. Really satisfying sound as it cuts your back hair. Only took me about ten minutes on my first try to get my whole back. Close shave, easy and comfy to hold. Now I don't have to wait until my wife is available to help me get ready for a first date. I can shave any ol' time I want. Where has the bakblade BEEN my whole adult life?
customer_reviews.author: Hospital Rat
